idea:

idea: HobSpace is a one stop solution for out of school activities for kids in age group of 3 to 14 year with an aim to to provide a holistic learning experience for children moving from the typical 3Rs of reading, writing, arithmetic to 5Cs: Communication, Collaboration, Creativity, Critical Thinking, and Citizenship.
name: EDUK8 LEARNING LABS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: SUCOMP TechSolutions is established to deliver Software as a service solution for Digital, Analytics and Cloud technologies. We primarily focus on small and medium scale companies enabling to grow in current digital era.
name: SUCOMP TechSolutions

idea: We are a newly incorporated manufacturing company. We are looking forward to manufacture state of the art machinery and equipment. The core area of operations will include Radiation monitoring systems, testing systems, Hydraulic and pneumatic based systems, and manufacturing of latest technology based machinery and equipment with applications in fields not limited to, but including space, defense, nuclear, energy, aerospace, oil and gas and chemicals industries.
name: NAYBEL TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
The company has identified approximately hundred small products which have market

potential. Out of these the firm is planning to design develop and launch about 20

products in the current financial year. Firm has already designed, developed and

supplied a Multifunction Display to the Indian Navy. The company already has received

expression of interest from several naval vessels for such systems.

A product Mix planned to be launched in first phase is appended here for reference

The company has been undertaking Power Control Panels and Distribution Panels and

intends to enter in this business in big way. This would require additional investment in

the form of factory space and infrastructure for production.

The company is also actively engaged in engineering consultancy and has several big

ticket consultancy projects in hand. Some of these include Submarine Escape Training

Tower for the Indian Navy, Helicopter landing Training Facility for the Indonesian Navy,

Ambulance Boats for the Maldives, Solar Power Project of 150 MW capacity for Sri

Lanka etc.
name: SOS SYSTEMS ON SHIP PVT LTD

idea: We are launching an Electric Toothbrush company. Our brushes are sleek and trendy and provide great oral care.

idea: We provide Cloud-based Practice Management Solution to Chartered Accounts, Tax Consultants and other related professional services firms on a SaaS platform. idea: Creating a end to end waste management solution for residential waste focused on segregation at source, home composting to generate revenue, backend tieup with recyclers for plastic and paper recycling and non-harmful techniques of non recyclable and hazardous waste

idea: Cartzfresh.com provides free home delivery of fresh fruits & vegetables, Cut, Chopped, Sprouts, peeled, groceries & daily household products. Consumers can order from comfort of your homes and get faster delivery at your doorstep with just a click on your phone.
